update.foreach: update department_target set contract_amount=#{item.contractAmount},revenue_target=#{item.revenueTarget}, collection_target=#{item.collectionTarget} where ot_id=#{item.otId} and om_id=#{item.omId}

mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.om_name FROM department_target as a LEFT JOIN organization_management as b on a.om_id=b.om_id where a.ot_id=#{id}
select count(t_id) from department_target where ot_id=#{id}

SELECT b.contract_amount,b.revenue_target,b.collection_target FROM operation_target as a LEFT JOIN department_target as b on a.ot_id=b.ot_id LEFT JOIN mode_status as c on a.ot_id=c.mode_id where c.status=2 and b.om_id=#{omId} and a.year=#{year}
